prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that has a graceful appearance and elegant features.
I want a Pokemon design that embodies both beauty and mystique in its color palette.
Generate a character concept for a small, humanoid Pokemon with flowing robes and a serene demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that has delicate features and is primarily green with hints of red.
Imagine a Pokemon that represents psychic powers, showcasing its elegance and grace in form.
Design a mystical creature that thrives in lush environments with a focus on its psychic abilities.
Show me a Pokemon that has a blend of green and white colors, emphasizing its gentle nature.
